thread.section_title: Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home | www.carpetoneoshawaon.com
thread.title: Bob
thread.title_full: Oshawa Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Bob

author: Bob
title: Bob
text:
From our first visit to Carpet One until we made our decision to proceed with them it was a very positive experience. Our salesman, Will Brisebois took his time with us, answered all of our questions and concerns and at no time did we feel pressured into making our decision.
We would highly recommend Carpet One for all your flooring needs.
